summary: An email from an FBI CID (Criminal Investigative Division) address to an unspecified recipient(s) regarding Jeffrey Epstein, asking for an update on the status of the case and what remains to be done.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as the subject of an inquiry from 'The DD' (likely Deputy Director or similar) asking for a status update on his case.

events.title: Status inquiry on Jeffrey Epstein case
events.description: An email is sent from an FBI CID address relaying questions from 'The DD' about the status of the Jeffrey Epstein investigation, what is left to be done, etc.

keyFacts: As of June 22, 2020, a high-level official ('The DD') within the FBI was inquiring about the status of the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
The email indicates an ongoing investigative or procedural process related to Epstein was active at that time.
The communication is internal, originating from an FBI Criminal Investigative Division (CID) email address.
